Hymn.English: 4 I said, Lord, be merciful to me; Heal my soul, for I have sinned against You.

Hymn.Arabic: أَنَا قُلْتُ يَا رَبُّ ارْحَمْنِي اِشْفِ نَفْسِي لِأَنِّي قَدْ أَخْطَأْتُ إِلَيْكَ ,
Hymn.English: 13 Blessed be the Lord God of Israel From everlasting to everlasting! Amen and Amen.     Alleluia
